title: Home
homeDescription: Peakseekers is a specific space to explorers share motivations, emotions, and their thoughts about the relationship between humans and mountains.
focusedStoriesExplorerParagraph: Show a map and a summary of your summits around the world
focusedStoriesPhotosParagraph: Evoke emotions through your photography in wild places
focusedStoriesReadabilityParagraph: Tell your story, we take care of the user experience
focusedStoriesMountainsParagraph: And counting... Here, our top countries:
applicationText: We know that not all places in nature have an internet signal. Our mobile app saves your stories offline for later publication.
privacySubtitle: We do not sell your data.
privacyText1: Peakseekers still believe in privacy nowadays.
privacyText2: We do not use the data that identifies you to sell you sponsored ads.
resetPasswordText: Enter the email associated with your account and we'll send an email with instructions to reset your password.
